column2: "Oh, hello <%me>! So you came here as well?"
"Me? I'm being shown around by these little guys."
"Ehe, it looks like they've already grown accustomed to you."

"It seems that they live here, but
they're not alarmed when you get close."
"But there's something about water that makes things more animated."
"I guess there being water here makes it the obvious choice for them to make their home in the oasis."
"Oh and that's right. I have an investigation request from Rogio."
"Apparently, there are suspicious parameters around this area, he says."
